comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content:
At the polo match at Meadow Brook Field of June 14, 1913.

America defeated England for the Newport Cup that day.

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: lifeasdaddy: Thanks again for the additional information.  We'll add this to the record next time we update.

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: I started an entry for him in Wikipedia: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Finley_Johnson_Shepard I started her biography in 2005: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Helen_Miller_Gould en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Meadowbrook_Polo_Club I started an entry on the history of the cup: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Newport_Cup_(polo)
